room_title: Escape room "The Workshop" by Escape Room Yuma in Yuma
room_description:
You’ve seen the news reports and heard the stories. You know there’s a serial killer stalking the streets of Yuma, taking their victims seemingly at random. Fear hasn’t struck Yuma like this in a long time. And you never thought you’d become a victim.

You and your friends are kidnapped, waking up in the serial killer’s workshop. You may be a victim, taken against your will, but will you become another body? Can you escape in 60 minutes before the serial killer returns?
